TP_name.third_party_sharing_practice_mentioned_i: disclosing the personal data you have provided to us to our third party service providers, agents and/or our affiliates or related corporations, and/or other third parties

your_rights.rights_mentioned_in_text: You may request to access and/or correct the personal data currently in our possession or control by submitting a written request to us
For a request to correct personal data, once we have sufficient information from you to deal with the request, we will: correct your personal data within 30 days

your_responsibilities.responsibilities_mentioned_in_text: However, this means that you must also update us of any changes in your personal data that you had initially provided us with
